00241   //-------------------- Filter pipeline  -------------------------//
00242 
00243   // Description:
00244   // Convenient pipeline hook for developers.
00245   // First and last filters of any pipeline (or part of pipeline)
00246   // whose output should be displayed in a slice.
00247   // For example, this is used in Editor/EdThreshold.tcl for
00248   // dynamic thresholding.
00249   // This is for display only!  It can't be used to actually change
00250   // the volumes in the slicer.  Use the editor (vtkImageEditorEffects)
00251   // for that.
00252   void SetFirstFilter(int s, vtkImageToImageFilter *filter);
00253   // LastFilter is of type vtkImageSource, a superclass of 
00254   // both vtkImageToImage and vtkMultipleInput filters.
00255   void SetLastFilter(int s, vtkImageSource *filter);
00256   vtkImageToImageFilter* GetFirstFilter(int s) ;
00257   vtkImageSource* GetLastFilter(int s) ;
00258 
00259   // Description:
00260   // Whether to apply pipeline defined by first, last filter
00261   // to the Back slice
00262   vtkGetMacro(BackFilter, int);
00263   vtkSetMacro(BackFilter, int);
00264   vtkBooleanMacro(BackFilter, int);
00265 
00266   // Description:
00267   // Whether to apply pipeline defined by first, last filter
00268   // to the Fore slice
00269   vtkGetMacro(ForeFilter, int);
00270   vtkSetMacro(ForeFilter, int);
00271   vtkBooleanMacro(ForeFilter, int);
00272 
00273   // Description:
00274   // Whether to apply pipeline defined by first, last filter
00275   // only to Active slice or to all three slices
00276   vtkGetMacro(FilterActive, int);
00277   vtkSetMacro(FilterActive, int);
00278   vtkBooleanMacro(FilterActive, int);
